text: Burton Albion Football Club is a professional football club based in the town of Burton upon Trent, Staffordshire, England. The team compete in League One, the third tier of English football. They were founded in 1950. Burton Albion's most famous moment was back in 1983, when they lost in the third round of the Football Association Challenge Cup (More Formerly known as the F.A Cup == Other websites == * Official website Category:1950s establishments in England Category:1950 establishments in Europe Category:English football clubs Category:Organisations based in Staffordshire
title: Burton Albion F.C.
